title: Drawing, Design for Music Cabinet "B" of Mahogany and Inlay, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Music Cabinet "B" of Mahogany and Inlay
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left corner of sheet: "B"; at upper left of design with arrow pointing to left door panel: SIX SHELVES INSIDE; at upper right, lower center, and lower left, numerical notations indicating dimensions; below image, right: MUSIC CABINET / OF MAHOGANY AND INLAY
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular cabinet with molded, frieze-like top, raised on 4 short, tapering legs on casters; closed upper shelf with 2 doors; open lower compartment filled with large folios separated by 2 bracket-shaped dividers.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Music Cabinet "B" of Mahogany and Inlay, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-216.
